name: PoisonKid
description:
arrow keys to move

spacebar to jump

bump into anyone to send them flying!

Synopsis; Be human poison in the role of Suki, a toxic devil-child who HATES EVERYTHING and EVERYONE.

Features:

  • bump people into spikes and poison bogs to rack up points!  Just be careful not to fall in yourself...
  • Collect bottles of poison!
  • Jump around 8 trippy platformer levels!

Known issues:

  • LOUD NOISES I recommend turning your volume low and adjusting for your own ears!

Made for MiniJam #129 theme "Poison" // limitation "You are not a hero".

Fonts are from Anna Anthropy's World of Fonts // Backgrounds generated using Deep-Fold's StarScapes.
